FuncDef: This command enables access to the context to configure an OSPF stub area and adds/removes the stub designation from the area. External routing information is not flooded into stub areas. All routers in the stub area must be configured with thestubcommand. An OSPF area cannot be both an NSSA and a stub area. Existing virtual links of a non STUB or NSSA area will be removed when its designation is changed to NSSA or STUB.
ExtraInfo: Default: no stub - The area is not configured as a stub area.
